Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • oware.Board
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    The Board class is a representation of the board state for a game of Oware

        getNorthHousesArray returns an array representing the number of seeds in each house belonging to the North player
        Returns:
        the array representation of the North player's houses

      • playMove

        public void playMove(Board.Side player,
                     Board.House house)
              throws OwareException
        playMove attempts to play the move indicated by the player and house parameters. If the move is invalid, then a result of false is returned.
        Parameters:
        player - a character representation of the player
        house - a character representation of the house
        Throws:
        OwareException - if the move is not valid

      • validateMove

        private void validateMove(Board.Side player,
                          Board.House house)
                   throws OwareException
        validateMove determines if the move indicated by the player and house parameters is valid
        Parameters:
        player - the side of the player
        house - the house
        Throws:
        OwareException - if the move is not valid

      • sow

        private int sow(Board.Side player,
                Board.House house)
        sow performs the sow portion of a player's move
        Parameters:
        player - the side of the player
        house - the house
        Returns:
        an integer representing the index into the houses array of the last seed placed

      • harvest

        private int harvest(Board.Side player,
                    int houseIndex)
        harvest performs the harvest portion of a player's move
        Parameters:
        player - the side of the player
        houseIndex - the index in the houses array indicating where the last seed was placed on the sow part of the turn
        Returns:
        an integer representing the number of seeds harvested

      • getHouseIndex

        private int getHouseIndex(Board.Side player,
                          Board.House house)
        getHouseIndex maps character representations of the player and house to an index in the houses array
        Parameters:
        player - a character representation of the player
        house - a character representation of the house
        Returns:
        the index of the house in the houses array or -1 if the parameters do not indicate a valid index

      • getNextHouseIndex

        private int getNextHouseIndex(int index)
        getNextHouseIndex returns the next house in the houses array
        Parameters:
        index - the current house index in the houses array
        Returns:
        the next house index in the houses array

      • getPreviousHouseIndex

        private int getPreviousHouseIndex(int index)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the previous house index in the houses array

      • isOnPlayerSide

        private boolean isOnPlayerSide(Board.Side player,
                               int houseIndex)
        isOnPlayerSide determines if the index passed in is on the side of the player passed in
        Parameters:
        player - a character representation of the player
        houseIndex - the house index into the houses array
        Returns:
        true if the index is on the indicated player's side, otherwise false
